info.title: TexAu Developer API
info.description: This is the public API documentation for TexAu. All our API calls are sent using JSON format and the responses are in JSON format as well. [Click Here](https://app.texau.com/developer) to create your API key. 90% of the API endpoints require an API Key ``` Authorization: APIKey ```

post.description:
To run a Spice, you need several inputs. 
#### Steps to follow
- Get the list of spices, click [here](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/5770396/T17DhpSq?version=latest#10ad4ccc-ee86-4f70-a68a-1de5ad8f1df7).
- Get the id of the Spice you want to run from the first step and run [get Spice by id](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/5770396/T17DhpSq?version=latest#871a74de-5f6b-46f5-ab37-d84db58bc22a) to get the inputs you need.
- You can now use the inputs to run the Spice.
For example, to run `Auto follow a Twitter profile`, the body of the request will look like this

```
{
    "funcName": "texau-automation-2-dev-twitterAutoFollow",
    "spiceId": "5d417d78b2ec164eec758213",
    "inputs": {
        "auth_token": "y8e9r0-0=t508585858",
        "profileUrl": "https://www.twitter.com/1244"
    },
    // eexecutionName is optional 
    "executionName": ""
}
```

To run a Recipe, you need variables. 
#### Steps to follow
- Get the list of rcepices, click [here](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/5770396/T17DhpSq?version=latest#5a2feb7c-9018-4fec-b9c5-a7ed50d70802).
- Get the id of the Recipe you want to run from the first step and run [get Recipe by id](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/5770396/T17DhpSq?version=latest#011a049b-e8fe-4644-8657-208a09eace17) to get the inputs you need.
- You can now use the inputs to run the Recipe.
For example, to run a specific Recipe, the body of the request will look like this

```
{
    "variable": {
        "li_at": "fhfioglpuufifpoiugigggggg",
        "postUrl": "https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6685",
        "maxCount": "10"
    }
}
```

result.message: Find email using LinkedIn Profile execution completed
